PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Randolph Scott, Martha Sleeper, Beryl Mercer, Buster Phelps
Screenplay: Maude Fulton
Director: Robert G. Vignola

A young medical intern is grief-stricken when his wife dies in childbirth. The tormented new father leaves the baby boy with relatives and heads abroad to complete his studies. Six years later, he returns home a successful physician engaged to a beautiful debutante. But trouble brews, more hazardous than anyone could expect after he sees his son again and experiences a dramatic change of heart.

metadata.Plot: Medical intern Robert Morley is distraught after his wife dies in childbirth. He's resentful of his new son and wants nothing to do with him. He leaves the child with his aunt and uncle and heads off to Europe to pursue his medical studies. Morley returns to his hometown six years later, now a successful doctor and engaged to be married to a beautiful socialite. He also feels differently about the boy and attempts to gain custody from his aunt and uncle.
metadata.Actors: Randolph Scott, Martha Sleeper, Beryl Mercer
